title: Tagliatelle con salsa bolognese
description: Indulge in our Tagliatelle al Ragu, a timeless Italian favorite. Tender tagliatelle pasta, perfectly paired with our rich and flavorful Bolognese sauce. Slow-simmered with ground meats, aromatic vegetables, and a splash of wine, this dish is a true taste of Italy. Topped with Parmesan cheese and parsley for an extra touch of perfection.
